explains: adj. 广阔的；广泛的；扩张的，发展的；开朗的，健谈的

sentences.en: The spectra show that the stars must have swallowed such planets during their expansive, red-giant stage.
sentences.cn: 光谱显示，这些恒星在膨胀的红巨星阶段肯定曾经吞没过这些行星。

sentences.en: He was becoming more expansive as he relaxed.
She was clearly relaxed and in an expansive mood.
sentences.cn: 她显然悠闲自在，心情豁朗。
